channel.title: Runescape Classic Replica
channel.description:
[center][url=http://www.rscreplica.org][img]http://rscreplica.org/images/styles/DarkCore/style_blue/logo.png[/img][/url][/center]
Runescape Classic Replica is a server that aims to be a complete replica of the original version of Runescape Classic, with the exception of subtile modifications (where as the experience rates are one of them). We wish to bring the Runescape Classic scene a quality server, that is stable and has the security level at top noch, further more bringing back the nostalgia of the gameplay. We have previously brought you Runescape Classic Replica back in 2012, which were a success however it stalled due to economy, which has been resolved at this point.
We feel comfortable with doing a full launch at this point, and we would highly appreciate that you as a player will report any given bugs, or missing features. We will not introduce batched skills, as the original game did not have these, and as stated above, we intend to replicate the original game.
[b]Experience Rates[/b] Skilling & Combat: 2.5x (Non-Subsribers) / 3.5x (Subscribers)
[b]Getting Started[/b] 1. Visit Runescape Classic Replica's website to register a forum account. 2. Download the Client Loader and login with your desired character name and login details.
[img]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa235/morter123456/client_zps3d023621.png[/img] [img]http://i200.photobucket.com/albums/aa235/morter123456/screenshot1_zpsf3630af2.png[/img]
[b]Runescape Classic Replica[/b] [url=http://www.rscreplica.org]Website[/url] [url=http://www.rscreplica.org/register.php]Register[/url] [url=http://www.rscreplica.org/forumdisplay.php?29-Rules]Rules[/url] [url=http://www.rscreplica.org/showthread.php?6]Client Download[/url]

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @Ch_ivava Ch ivava
item.description:
@Ch_ivava wrote:

Greetings Players,

We are happy to announce that from friday the 5th September we will offer all new registered players will recieve a 15 day subscribers status, this will be an automated process and further more, for each day that goes on untill the 20th September the maximum achieveable subscribers status will lower by each day.

All current registered players will also recieve a 15 day worth of subscriber status, this will be manually added to your account by our Developers.
I example if you register on the 8th September, you will only recieve 13 days worth of subscriber status.

Enjoy the weekend with us and your subscribers status.

Regards,
Simon

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @MrFamous MrFamous
item.description:
@MrFamous wrote:

Daily updates are done on server, hope new players will show up too !

See you in game

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @Ch_ivava Ch ivava
item.description:
@Ch_ivava wrote:

EazY:

Raise the xp rate and make it so mac user can play and add a high-scores if you don’t plan on sorting out either of these than your server is already a failure.

We are currently looking into adding the hiscores to our server, and I will notify the developer to look into a Mac version of our client.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

It’s all good saying that, but most hosting the replicas these days don’t seem to want to be up that high. It should be put to a poll for the players I think. After al it is them that have to spend the time training. Just my 2 cents though…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

nah people can’t be bothered grinding it all, like 8-10x rates it needs to be for combat and 6-8x skilling

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

This server isn’t bad at all. Yeah personally I feel the rates could be slightly higher, but I’d rather play this than rsce anyday.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

i actually agree with you we need a replica of rsce but not the low rates, exact same as rsc with higher rates thats all that is needed, Apart from the corruption ect

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

l0w archer:

There is already “replicas” out there too mate, about time there was a change to be honest, Or maybe were just clinging onto our childhood memories lol.

The only reason I still play is due to those childhood memories, sure customs are fun for a while… but they aren’t what made me fall in love with this game as they didn’t exist.

Just a lack of corruption, get the game to the state it once was (bug wise) and fair rates… I’m happy to stick around and continue to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @Ch_ivava Ch ivava
item.description:
@Ch_ivava wrote:

That is a sad history they have, but honestly I do believe that the players of the RSC Community wants a proper Replica, and there is already some of those custom servers out there.
I personally have gotten tirred of other servers being brought to live, only to dissapoint me or others, and therefore I am creating this server along with Chaotic. We may eventually host polls that will be related to new content that is in the spirit of RSC, but at this given moment, making all the features and functions should be top priority first.

Please feel free to check out our server, if you’d like.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

Wise idea, nothing worse than being afk to come back and find you died due to an update lol :palm:

Good work so far. After playing both RSCE and RSCReplica I would pick this hands down.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @MrFamous MrFamous
item.description:
@MrFamous wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:4, topic:546353”]After trying out the server and talking to the staff, It is definitely on par with any competitor replica that is currently online…

Don’t be fooled by the rates either, for some reason they are surprisingly good once you get in game and start playing.

There is one major difference with this and RSCE, There are actual updates! Frequent ones too… Plus subs are cheaper. So far, I would definitely recommend this for people who enjoy low rate servers. (For me to say that, is a BIG thing… I usually hate replicas).

So be sure to at least give the server a shot, You will not be disappointed.[/quote]

Glad to see our work is appreciated ! Thanks for the kind words Inspectah, waiting more players to check out RSC Replica. Updates will show daily for now, then we gonna pick a maintenance day for updates (to not bother players).

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica

There is one major difference with this and RSCE, There are actual updates! Frequent ones too… Plus subs are cheaper. So far, I would definitely recommend this for people who enjoy low rate servers. (For me to say that, is a BIG thing… I usually hate replicas).

So be sure to at least give the server a shot, You will not be disappointed.[/quote]
Thank you for the very kind words, we highly appreciate this. We do hope that we will have alot of new players try out our server and stay with us.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Replica
item.dc:creator: @Ch_ivava Ch ivava
item.description:
@Ch_ivava wrote:

I personally believe that I will be able to put the dedication and effort into making this community into a succesfull one, I do understand that it requires money to raise a new community, and that is something that I am willing to sacrifice. I understand that players gets frustrated that they have to start all over again, whenever they choose to go to another server, but how fun is it to be in one of those communities that are left to die even shortly after their launch?

Read full topic

Runescape Classic Replica is a server that aims to be a complete replica of the original version of Runescape Classic, with the exception of subtile modifications (where as the experience rates are one of them).
